lead_paragraph: India test captain Virat Kohli remains sceptical on the accuracy of ball-tracking technology but hinted India might be ready to finally embrace the Decision Review System (DRS).

headline.print_headline: Cricket-Kohli Hints at End to India's Dogged DRS Resistance
headline.main: Cricket-Kohli Hints at End to India's Dogged DRS Resistance

snippet: India test captain Virat Kohli remains sceptical on the accuracy of ball-tracking technology but hinted India might be ready to finally embrace the Decision Review System (DRS)....
